title: Nice fully furbished 2 rooms-flat in NeukRichardskiez
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Minimum rental period is 6 months, with the possibility of extending to one year.
The apartment is ideal for one person or a couple.

This 75 sqm apartment is located in Richardkiez, one of the most charming neighborhoods in Neukölln. The area is peaceful with a village-like atmosphere, yet close to numerous bars and restaurants. Public transportation is easily accessible, with the Ringbahn about 5 minutes away, the U7 about 10 minutes away on foot, and nearby bus connections.

Situated on the first floor, the apartment features a living room, kitchen, bedroom, storeroom, and corridor. There is also a loggia. The bathroom has been newly renovated and includes a bathtub. The flat is fully furnished.

The total rent includes the operating and heating costs, furnishing, electricity and internet. Rental deposit 2300 Euros.
Anmeldung is possible
